title: CryptonZzz
author: CryptonZzz
content: Pepe BNB to List Token on Major Exchanges, Bringing Pepe the Frog to the MassesPepe BNB is pleased to announce the listing of its Pepe the Frog-inspired token on MEXC exchange, effective May 9th, 2023 from 13:00 (UTC). This exciting development will make $PepeBNB token more widely available to users seeking an alternative to high gas costs on the Ethereum network.The $PepeBNB token can be now purchased on Pancakeswap on the BNB Chain, and now will be available on MEXC exchange. This listing is the first of several planned moves to make $PepeBNB more widely available on centralized exchanges, including Bitmart and others.In addition to its growing availability, Pepe BNB team is also proud to offer PEPOGS NFTs, which can be minted from PEPOGS.com. The combination of unique tokens and collectibles offers a fun and innovative way for users to engage with the PepeBNB ecosystem and is taking the Pepe meme to the next level.As PepeBNB continues to expand its reach and availability, the team remains committed to delivering a user-friendly and engaging experience for all members of the community. Stay tuned for more exciting developments in the near future.About Pepe The Frog token:$PEPEBNB contract address on BNB Chain is 0x47fd014706081068448b89fc6baca2730977216aWebsite: https://pepebnb.com/PEPOGS NFTs: https://www.pepogs.com/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/bnbpepeTelegram: https://t.me/BNBPEPEReddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/PEPEBNB/CoinMarketCap: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/pepe-the-frog/CoinGecko: https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/pepe-the-frogBuy on DEXTools: https://www.dextools.io/app/en/bnb/pair-explorer/0x07b33bc3214a075dbebec8c72d175c7aa9b3dd56Buy on Pancakeswap: https://pancakeswap.finance/swap?outputCurrency=0x47fd014706081068448b89fc6baca2730977216aBuy on MEXC: [url]https://www.mexc.com/exchange/PEPEBNB_USDT]https://pancakeswap.finance/swap?outputCurrency=0x47fd014706081068448b89fc6baca2730977216aBuy on MEXC: https://www.mexc.com/exchange/PEPEBNB_USDT

comments.author: poodle63
comments.body: Click bait title and fake news. It's real pepe that already listed on binance. This shit scam pepe token will never be listed anywhere. MEXC is such a garbage exchange site that can listing any tokens when i just need to pay 10k USD for it. Binance will never listing stupid clone token like this. You're spreading false claim.
